name: Stobox
description: "Stobox Token [STBU] is a native utility token of the Stobox Exchange, one of the products of the ecosystem built by Stobox company. STBU is utilised as the commissions token as well as to reward customers who bring most value to ecosystem and provide them with special terms. STBU use cases include but not limited to paying fees and commissions on the Stobox Exchange and related crypto activities."
